summary: The implementation successfully addresses all four requirements. REQ-1 removed AccessControl checks from getCallerUserProfile. REQ-2, REQ-3, and REQ-4 added the three self-registration functions (selfRegisterClient, selfRegisterPartner, selfRegisterInternal) with proper validation and error messages. The frontend integration was also implemented to support the new registration flows.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend registration flow and hooks (useRegistration.ts, RegistrationFlow.tsx) were implemented
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Creating frontend UI for the self-registration flows' as a non-goal

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added to support data migration
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified adding a migration module or migration functionality
